title: deleteById without _route_ param for implicit router could be broadcast
description:
A deleteById request without _route_ param for implicit router could be sent to all shard leaders (Shalin). Alternatively, a new router (or a strict mode for implicit router) that requires route to be set for all adds/deletes (Yonik).

Some discussion here in SOLR-5890:

https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/SOLR-5890?focusedCommentId=14236722&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:comment-tabpanel#comment-14236722
